briefTitle: A Study of ALKS 5461 for Treatment Refractory Major Depressive Disorder (MDD)
officialTitle: A Phase 3b Efficacy and Safety Study of Adjunctive ALKS 5461 in Treatment Refractory Major Depressive Disorder
summary: This study will evaluate the efficacy, safety, and tolerability of adjunctive ALKS 5461 in adults who have treatment refractory MDD.

primaryOutcome.measure: Change From Baseline to the End of Treatment (EOT) in the Montgomery Asberg Depression Rating Scale-10 (MADRS-10) Scores
primaryOutcome.timeFrame: Baseline and 5 weeks for Stage 1, Baseline and 6 weeks for Stage 2

pValues.comp: OG000 vs OG001 vs OG002 vs OG003
